operation.name: Insert
operation.sql: INSERT INTO video_sizes (video_size_id, size_type, width, height, file_size, video_start_ts, file_path) VALUES (:video_size_id, :size_type, :width, :height, :file_size, :video_start_ts, :file_path)

operation.name: SelectListByVideoSizeId
operation.sql: SELECT id, video_size_id, size_type, width, height, file_size, video_start_ts, file_path FROM video_sizes WHERE video_size_id = :video_size_id ORDER BY id

operation.name: SelectListByVideoSizeIdList
operation.sql: SELECT id, video_size_id, size_type, width, height, file_size, video_start_ts, file_path FROM video_sizes WHERE video_size_id IN (:idList) ORDER BY id
